title: Microsoft will publish an original sci-fi short story anthology to promote its research projects
text:
Microsoft will publish an original sci-fi short story anthology to promote its research projects 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft is promoting its advanced research efforts in a rather unique way. The company has announced plans to release an original ebook sc...
